amendment.description: An amendment numbered 87 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to direct the FAA Administrator to engage and cooperate with air carriers to identify and facilitate opportunities for air carriers to retrofit aircraft with devices that mitigate noise, including vortex generators.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 227 (Roll no. 160).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Lynch.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 227 (Roll no. 160).
